creator: MaryoriS
title: Altera CPLD Max II Blink Led
description: This project demonstrates how to blink an LED using an Altera CPLD Max II and Verilog code. The code utilizes a counter to toggle the LED state at a specific frequency.
steps: Write the Verilog code: module ledblink(clk,led); input clk; output led; reg led; reg[23:0] cnt; always @(posedge clk) begin cnt<= cnt + 1'b1; led<=cnt[23]; end endmodule
Compile and upload the Verilog code to the Altera CPLD Max II using appropriate software.
Connect an LED to the designated output pin of the CPLD.
Connect a clock signal to the designated clock input pin of the CPLD.
